spatial_entry.profound: Core of spatial computing: blending real and virtual to create felt embodiment. Cultivates deeper sensory awareness, turning abstract ideas into tangible experiences for growth.
spatial_entry.synthPhrase: Where digital space becomes felt presence

spatial_interaction.profound: Recursive feedback via gestures, haptics, and spatial audio in AR/VR. Actions in immersive spaces reinforce neural pathways, accelerating skill acquisition through embodied practice.
spatial_interaction.synthPhrase: Touch the digital, train the nervous system

spatial_cognition.profound: Mind expands into digital space, offloading memory and visualization to environments. Uses spatial metaphors for abstract concepts, enabling fractal-like unpacking of complex ideas in consciousness.

spatial_empathy.profound: Inhabit others' perspectives through shared spatial experiences or avatars. Breaks ego boundaries, promoting collective awareness and recursive understanding of interconnected selves.

spatial_transcendence.profound: At depth, dissolve body-digital divide for fluid, multi-dimensional identity. Recursive loops of embodiment lead to non-dual states, where spatial computing catalyzes absolute unity consciousness.
spatial_transcendence.synthPhrase: Digital and flesh dissolve into one field
